name: @wc-toolkit/wclint
description: CLI tool for validating Web Components using Custom Elements Manifest

scripts.demo:html: npm run build && node dist/cli.js validate --config demo/wc.config.js demo/*.html
scripts.demo:md: npm run build && node dist/cli.js validate --config demo/wc.config.js demo/*.md
scripts.demo:ts: npm run build && node dist/cli.js validate --config demo/wc.config.js demo/*.ts
scripts.predemo:validate: pnpm --filter @wc-toolkit/language-server run build && pnpm --filter @wc-toolkit/wclint run build
scripts.demo:validate-json: npm run build && node dist/cli.js validate --config demo/wc.config.js --format json demo/*.html
scripts.demo:validate-junit: npm run build && node dist/cli.js validate --config demo/wc.config.js --format junit demo/*.html
scripts.demo:init: npm run build && node dist/cli.js init demo/sample-config.js
scripts.demo:all: pnpm run demo:validate && pnpm run demo:validate-json && pnpm run demo:validate-junit
scripts.pretest:unit: pnpm --filter @wc-toolkit/language-server run build && pnpm run build
